005.json.src: 「ひとり親家庭の支援制度」のご案内

005.json.src: 詳しいことは、問合せ先に聞いてください。

005.json.mt: Child Rearing Allowance/Nagoya City Single Parent Family Allowance/Aichi Prefecture Orphan Allowance

005.json.src: 離婚、未婚、死亡などの ため１人で18歳以下のお子さんを育てている場合に支給されます。
005.json.mt: If you are raising a child under the age of 18 by yourself due to divorce, unmarriage, death, etc., you will be paid.

005.json.src: ※お父さんまたはお母さんが一定の障害の状態にある場合を含みます。
005.json.mt: * Including cases where the father or mother has a certain disability.

005.json.src: ※お子さんが18歳の場合、誕生日～3月31日までは対象になります。
005.json.mt: * If the child is 18 years old, it is eligible from the birthday to March 31st.

005.json.src: 国民年金加入者や老齢基礎年金に25年以上加入していた方が死亡し、その配偶者が18歳以下のお子さんと一緒に暮らしている場合などに支給されます。
005.json.mt: This benefit is paid to a person who has been enrolled in the National Pension or Old-age Basic Pension for 25 years or more and whose spouse lives with a child under the age of 18.

005.json.src: ※お子さんが18歳の場合、誕生日～3月31日までは対象になります。
005.json.mt: * If the child is 18 years old, it is eligible from the birthday to March 31st.

errors.text: receive the application of the tax reduction system

005.json.src: また、条件に該当する方は、住民税（市・県民税）が非課税となったり、減免される場合があります。
005.json.mt: In addition, those who meet the conditions may be exempted from or exempted from inhabitant tax (city/prefectural tax).

005.json.src: 適用を受けようとする場合は、年末調整や確定申告で忘れずに申告をしてください。
005.json.mt: If you want to apply, please do not forget to declare it at the year-end tax adjustment or final tax return.

005.json.mt: If it is temporarily difficult to raise a child at home due to social reasons such as parental illness, in principle, the child will be looked after at an infant home, children's home, or foster home for up to one week.

005.json.mt: If you need childcare for your child due to work or other reasons, you can use a nursery school.

005.json.src: 休日保育や延長保育、夜間保育、病児保育、病児後保育などもあります。

005.json.src: 一時預かり

005.json.mt: When childcare at home becomes temporarily difficult due to unforeseen circumstances, or in order to reduce the mental and physical burden on guardians due to childcare fatigue, we temporarily take care of children.

005.json.src: 学習習慣を身に付けることや高校進学などを目指して、一人ひとりの学習レベルに合わせた学習会を開催しています。
005.json.mt: We hold study sessions tailored to each student's learning level with the aim of developing good study habits and preparing for high school.

005.json.src: 問合せ先：子ども青少年局子ども未来企画室　TEL972-3199
005.json.mt: Contact: Child Future Planning Office, Children and Youth Bureau TEL972-3199

005.json.src: ひとり親家庭の子どもの居場所づくり
005.json.mt: Creating places for children in single-parent families

005.json.src: 小学５年生から中学３年生までのお子さんを対象に、気軽に立ち寄り、おしゃべりをしたり宿題をしたり、ゆっくり過ごしたりイベントに参加することができる場を設けています
005.json.mt: For children from the 5th grade of elementary school to the 3rd grade of junior high school, we have set up a place where you can casually stop by, chat, do your homework, spend time slowly, and participate in events.

005.json.src: 問合せ先：子ども青少年局子ども未来企画室　TEL972-3199
005.json.mt: Contact: Child Future Planning Office, Children and Youth Bureau TEL972-3199

005.json.src: 文化・スポーツ交流
005.json.mt: Cultural and sports exchange

005.json.src: 「親と子」「ひとり親同士」の交流や、将来の職業選択のきっかけとなるよう、スポーツや音楽などプロの世界を体験できるイベントを開催しています。
005.json.mt: We hold events where you can experience the world of professionals, such as sports and music, so that you can interact with parents and children and between single parents, and provide opportunities for future career choices.

errors.text: so that you can interact with parents and children and between single parents
and provide opportunities for future career choices.

005.json.src: 問合せ先：子ども青少年局子ども未来企画室　TEL972-2522
005.json.mt: Contact: Child Future Planning Office, Children and Youth Bureau TEL972-2522

005.json.src: ひとり親家庭休養ホーム
005.json.mt: Single parent family rest home

005.json.src: 「国民宿舎奥浜名湖」などの宿泊施設や「レゴランド」などの日帰り施設を利用する場合、料金が補助されます。
005.json.mt: Fees are subsidized when using lodging facilities such as Kokuminshukusha Okuhamanako and day-trip facilities such as Legoland.

005.json.src: 問合せ先：区役所民生子ども課民生子ども係　支所区民福祉課保護・子ども係
005.json.mt: Inquiries: Ward Office Public Welfare and Child Affairs Section Public Welfare and Children Section Branch Resident Welfare Section Protection and Children Section

errors.text: Ward Office Public Welfare and Child Affairs Section Public Welfare and Children Section Branch Resident Welfare Section Protection and Children Section

005.json.src: 市有施設優待利用
005.json.mt: Discounted use of municipal facilities

005.json.src: 東山動植物園や市科学館など市の施設が、無料で利用できます。
005.json.mt: City facilities such as the Higashiyama Zoo and Botanical Gardens and the City Science Museum can be used free of charge.
